scripts.install-plugin: SRC=$PWD && echo "Installing from $SRC" && test -d $HOME/.node-red && (cd $HOME/.node-red && npm install $SRC) || (echo 'Error: $HOME/.node-red not found. Please initialize Node-RED first.' && exit 1)
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src -e js,html --exec "npm run install-plugin && npm run restart-node-red"
